newsitem.title: USA: FINLAY ENTERPRISES Q2 TOTAL SALES UP.
newsitem.headline: FINLAY ENTERPRISES Q2 TOTAL SALES UP.

text.p: Finlay Enterprises Inc said Wednesday that total consolidated sales, including international, for the second quarter ended August 2, increased 7.9 percent to $148.1 million, up from $137.2 million in the comparable period of 1996.
The company said that comparable department sales for the second quarter increased 6.9 percent.
Comparable department sales for the six months ended August 2 increased 5.7 percent, Finlay said.
Total consolidated sales for the six months increased 5.5 percent to $282.6 million, up from $267.9 million in the first six months of 1996, Finlay said.

Finlay Enterprises Inc, through its wholly owned subsidiary, Finlay Fine Jewelry Corp, is a jewelry retailer and operator of leased jewelry departments in department stores throughout the United States and France.
